tasks.title: Setup Project Repository and CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository and configure automated CI/CD pipeline for testing and deployment.
tasks.details: Create a new repository for the project. Set up GitHub Actions or Azure DevOps for automated builds, tests, and deployments. Configure environment variables and secrets for cloud credentials. Ensure pipeline supports React 18 + TypeScript and Supabase backend.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify pipeline runs on code push, executes unit tests, and deploys to staging environment.

subtasks.title: Create Project Repository
subtasks.description: Set up a new project repository in the chosen version control system (e.g., GitHub, GitLab). Initialize the repository with a README and appropriate .gitignore files.
subtasks.details: This step establishes the foundation for source code management and collaboration. Ensure repository permissions and branch protections are configured as needed.

subtasks.title: Configure CI/CD Tool
subtasks.description: Select and configure the CI/CD tool (e.g., GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI). Integrate it with the project repository and install any required plugins or runners.
subtasks.details: Connect the repository to the CI/CD tool and verify that the tool can access the codebase. Set up basic project-level settings and permissions for the CI/CD system.

subtasks.title: Set Up Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Define and securely store environment variables required for the build and deployment processes within the CI/CD tool.
subtasks.details: Add secrets such as API keys, database credentials, and deployment tokens to the CI/CD tool’s environment variable management system. Ensure sensitive data is not exposed in logs or code.

subtasks.title: Develop Pipeline Scripts
subtasks.description: Write and commit pipeline configuration scripts (e.g., YAML files for GitHub Actions or Jenkinsfiles) that define the build, test, and deployment stages.
subtasks.details: Implement scripts that automate code building, testing, and deployment. Include steps for installing dependencies, running tests, and deploying to target environments.

subtasks.title: Verify Deployment and Pipeline Functionality
subtasks.description: Trigger the CI/CD pipeline to ensure all stages execute correctly and the application is successfully deployed to the target environment.
subtasks.details: Monitor pipeline runs for errors, validate deployment outcomes, and review logs to confirm that environment variables and scripts function as intended.

tasks.title: Design and Implement Supabase Backend Schema
tasks.description: Define and implement the database schema for organizations, users, scans, rules, and audit logs.
tasks.details: Create tables for Organization (org_id), User (authentication, roles), Scan (jobs, results, status), Rule (built-in and custom), and Audit Log (user actions). Enable row-level security and end-to-end encryption. Use Supabase REST API (PostgREST) for data access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations for each table, validate row-level security, and verify encryption.

subtasks.title: Schema Design for All Entities
subtasks.description: Analyze requirements, identify entities, define attributes, relationships, and constraints. Document the schema using an ERD and a data dictionary.
subtasks.details: Include primary keys, foreign keys, normalization, and naming conventions. Ensure the schema supports scalability and security best practices.

subtasks.title: Table Creation for Each Entity
subtasks.description: Translate the schema into SQL DDL statements to create tables for each entity, including columns, data types, keys, and constraints.
subtasks.details:
Implement all relationships and indexes as defined in the schema. Validate table structures against the ERD and data dictionary.
<info added on 2025-06-12T02:58:54.057Z>

subtasks.title: Implement Row-Level Security
subtasks.description: Configure row-level security policies to restrict data access based on user roles or attributes.
subtasks.details: Define and apply security policies for each table as required, ensuring compliance with data protection requirements.

subtasks.title: Enable Data Encryption
subtasks.description: Set up encryption for data at rest and in transit for all tables and sensitive columns.
subtasks.details: Implement database-native encryption features and verify encryption settings for compliance and effectiveness.

subtasks.title: Set Up REST API Access
subtasks.description: Develop and configure RESTful API endpoints to provide secure access to the database entities.
subtasks.details: Ensure the API enforces authentication, authorization, and integrates with row-level security and encryption mechanisms.

subtasks.title: CRUD Operation Testing
subtasks.description: Test Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations via the REST API for all entities, verifying security and data integrity.
subtasks.details: Validate that row-level security and encryption are enforced during all operations. Document and resolve any issues found.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication and Role-Based Access
tasks.description: Develop user authentication and role-based access control for the platform.
tasks.details: Integrate Supabase Auth for user sign-up, sign-in, and password reset. Define roles (Security Team, Compliance Officer, Developer, IT Admin). Implement JWT-based session management and role checks on API endpoints.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration, login, role assignment, and access control for protected endpoints.

subtasks.title: Integrate Supabase Auth into the Application
subtasks.description: Set up Supabase Auth in the project, including installing necessary packages, configuring environment variables, and initializing Supabase clients for authentication.
subtasks.details: Follow Supabase documentation to install @supabase/supabase-js and configure project URL and anon key. Ensure the app can connect to Supabase and perform basic authentication flows (sign up, sign in, sign out).

subtasks.title: Implement Role Definitions and Authorization Logic
subtasks.description: Define user roles and set up authorization logic using Supabase's Row Level Security (RLS) or external tools as needed.
subtasks.details: Model roles in the database, create RLS policies, and optionally use tools like Permit.io for fine-grained access control. Ensure roles are assigned to users and authorization rules are enforced at the database level.

subtasks.title: Implement Session Management
subtasks.description: Set up session management to handle user authentication state, token storage, and automatic refresh of sessions.
subtasks.details: Use Supabase Auth's session management features to track user sessions, store JWTs securely, and handle session expiration and renewal in the frontend and backend.

subtasks.title: Secure API Endpoints Based on Roles
subtasks.description: Protect API endpoints by verifying user authentication and enforcing role-based access control.
subtasks.details: Implement middleware or server-side logic to check JWTs, validate user roles, and restrict access to sensitive endpoints according to defined authorization rules.

subtasks.title: Test Access Control and Security
subtasks.description: Thoroughly test authentication, role assignments, session handling, and access control to ensure security and correct behavior.
subtasks.details: Write and execute tests for various user roles and scenarios, including unauthorized access attempts, session expiration, and correct enforcement of RLS and API protections.

tasks.title: Build Microsoft 365 and Azure Entra ID API Connectors
tasks.description: Develop API connectors to fetch configuration data from Microsoft 365 and Azure Entra ID.
tasks.details: Use Microsoft Graph API to retrieve configuration data. Implement OAuth2 authentication and token management. Handle pagination and error cases. Store retrieved data in Supabase.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API authentication, data retrieval, and storage in Supabase. Validate error handling.

subtasks.title: API Authentication Setup
subtasks.description: Implement secure authentication for the API, following best practices such as using OAuth2, API keys, or JWTs. Ensure secure storage and transmission of credentials, and implement token revocation and expiration policies.
subtasks.details: Research and select the appropriate authentication method for the API (e.g., OAuth2 for Microsoft Graph). Set up secure storage for API keys or tokens, enforce strong password policies if applicable, and implement mechanisms for token revocation and expiration.

subtasks.title: Supabase Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate Supabase as the backend database for storing and retrieving data fetched from the external API.
subtasks.details: Set up Supabase project, configure tables and schemas, and establish secure connections between the application and Supabase. Ensure proper access controls and data validation.

subtasks.title: Data Retrieval Logic
subtasks.description: Develop logic to connect to the external API (e.g., Microsoft Graph), authenticate requests, and retrieve the required data.
subtasks.details: Implement API client logic to handle authentication, construct requests, and parse responses. Ensure that data is correctly mapped and stored in Supabase.

subtasks.title: Pagination Handling
subtasks.description: Implement logic to handle paginated responses from the external API, ensuring all data is retrieved efficiently.
subtasks.details: Detect and process pagination tokens or next-page URLs in API responses. Loop or recursively fetch all pages of data and aggregate results before storing them in Supabase.

subtasks.title: Error Management
subtasks.description: Design and implement robust error handling for authentication failures, API errors, network issues, and data storage problems.
subtasks.details: Define error handling strategies for each failure point, including retries, logging, user feedback, and fallback mechanisms. Ensure errors are surfaced appropriately and do not compromise security or data integrity.

subtasks.title: End-to-End Testing
subtasks.description: Develop and execute comprehensive tests covering authentication, data retrieval, pagination, error handling, and Supabase integration.
subtasks.details: Write automated tests to simulate real-world scenarios, including successful and failed authentications, paginated data retrieval, error conditions, and data persistence in Supabase. Validate that the entire workflow operates as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Core Compliance Scanning Engine
tasks.description: Develop the core scanning logic to detect misconfigurations and vulnerabilities.
tasks.details: Create a rule engine that applies predefined compliance rules (NIST, ISO 27001, CIS Controls) to the fetched data. Store scan results in Supabase. Support basic remediation status tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test scanning logic with sample data, validate rule application, and result storage.

subtasks.title: Rule Engine Architecture Design
subtasks.description: Design the overall architecture for the rule engine, including core components such as rule repository, trigger services, processing engine, and execution services. Define interfaces for extensibility and modularity.
subtasks.details: Establish standards for rule definition, hierarchy, and management. Specify how rules will be stored, retrieved, and versioned. Ensure the design supports scalability and maintainability.

subtasks.title: Rule Implementation and Management
subtasks.description: Develop and implement the rules according to the designed architecture. Set up a central repository for rule storage and management, and define processes for rule authoring, testing, and deployment.
subtasks.details: Break down rules into modular, reusable components. Implement rule triggers, conditions, and actions. Establish best practices for rule optimization and monitoring.

subtasks.title: Data Ingestion Pipeline Development
subtasks.description: Build a robust data ingestion pipeline to collect, validate, and preprocess input data required for rule evaluation and scan execution.
subtasks.details: Define supported data formats and sources. Implement data validation, transformation, and error handling mechanisms to ensure data quality and consistency.

subtasks.title: Scan Execution Engine Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop the scan execution engine that applies the implemented rules to ingested data, orchestrates rule evaluation, and manages execution flow.
subtasks.details: Ensure efficient rule execution, support for parallelism, and proper error handling. Integrate with the rule engine and data ingestion components.

subtasks.title: Result Storage and Management
subtasks.description: Design and implement a storage solution for scan results, ensuring efficient retrieval, indexing, and historical tracking.
subtasks.details: Define data models for storing results, including metadata, timestamps, and rule references. Ensure compliance with data retention and security requirements.

subtasks.title: Remediation Tracking System
subtasks.description: Develop a system to track remediation actions based on scan results, including status updates, assignments, and resolution verification.
subtasks.details: Integrate with result storage to link findings to remediation tasks. Provide interfaces for updating and monitoring remediation progress.

subtasks.title: Validation and Testing Framework
subtasks.description: Create a comprehensive validation and testing framework to ensure correctness, performance, and reliability of the rule engine, scan execution, and result tracking.
subtasks.details: Develop automated test cases covering various scenarios and edge cases. Implement monitoring and reporting tools for continuous validation.

tasks.title: Develop Simple Dashboard for Scan Results
tasks.description: Build a basic dashboard to display scan results and compliance status.
tasks.details: Use React 18 + TypeScript with react-grid-layout for the dashboard. Fetch scan results from Supabase. Display compliance status, issues, and remediation progress. Ensure basic authentication and role-based access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard rendering, data fetching, and access control.

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard Layout
subtasks.description: Create the visual structure and wireframe for the dashboard, organizing sections for compliance status, data summaries, and navigation.
subtasks.details: Define the dashboard’s purpose, audience, and key KPIs. Sketch the layout to ensure clarity and user-centricity, referencing best practices for dashboard design.

subtasks.title: Integrate Authentication
subtasks.description: Implement authentication and role-based access control to ensure only authorized users can access and interact with the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Set up authentication mechanisms and define user roles. Configure security rules to display appropriate information based on user access levels.

subtasks.title: Implement Data Fetching
subtasks.description: Develop backend queries and API integrations to retrieve compliance and related data for the dashboard.
subtasks.details: Create and optimize queries to fetch data from relevant databases or external sources. Ensure data is accurate, timely, and formatted for dashboard use.

subtasks.title: Visualize Compliance Status
subtasks.description: Develop and integrate visual components (charts, graphs, indicators) to display compliance status and related metrics.
subtasks.details: Choose appropriate visualization types for compliance data. Implement interactive and accessible UI elements to clearly communicate status and trends.

subtasks.title: Conduct UI Testing
subtasks.description: Test the dashboard interface for usability, accessibility, and correct data display across user roles.
subtasks.details: Perform manual and automated UI tests to validate layout, data accuracy, role-based visibility, and responsiveness. Address any issues found during testing.

tasks.title: Implement Audit Logging for User Actions
tasks.description: Log all user actions for compliance and security.
tasks.details: Extend Supabase schema to include audit log table. Log key user actions (login, scan trigger, rule update, etc.). Ensure logs are immutable and accessible only to authorized roles.
tasks.testStrategy: Test logging of user actions, verify immutability, and access control.

subtasks.title: Extend Schema for Audit Logging
subtasks.description: Modify the existing database schema to support audit logging. This includes adding new tables or fields to capture essential audit data such as user IDs, timestamps, event types, affected resources, and outcomes.
subtasks.details: Ensure the schema supports comprehensive and scalable logging. Plan for long-term storage and retention in accordance with compliance requirements. Consider using a standardized log format for consistency.

subtasks.title: Implement Logging Logic
subtasks.description: Develop and integrate the logic required to generate audit logs for relevant actions within the application. Ensure logs are generated automatically and asynchronously to avoid performance bottlenecks.
subtasks.details: Prefer implicit log generation tied to access checks and critical events. Include decision logs and annotations for context. Use dedicated functions to record logs without adding latency.

subtasks.title: Enforce Immutability of Audit Logs
subtasks.description: Implement mechanisms to ensure that audit logs, once written, cannot be altered or deleted. This is crucial for maintaining the integrity and trustworthiness of the audit trail.
subtasks.details: Use tamper-proof storage solutions and apply log protection measures. Consider cryptographic techniques or write-once storage to enforce immutability.

subtasks.title: Validate Access Control for Audit Logs
subtasks.description: Establish and test access control policies to restrict who can view, query, or manage audit logs. Ensure only authorized personnel have access, and all access is itself logged.
subtasks.details: Configure secure, role-based access to audit logs. Regularly review access permissions and audit log access events to detect unauthorized activity.

tasks.title: Integrate AI-Driven Risk Analysis Microservice
tasks.description: Develop and integrate an AI microservice for risk prediction and remediation suggestions.
tasks.details: Host TensorFlow/Scikit-learn model on Azure or AWS. Expose REST API for risk analysis. Integrate with backend to process scan results and provide recommendations. Support human-in-the-loop validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test AI model integration, recommendation accuracy, and validation workflow.

subtasks.title: Model Hosting Setup
subtasks.description: Deploy the AI/ML model to a scalable and secure hosting environment, ensuring proper configuration and monitoring.

subtasks.title: REST API Development
subtasks.description: Develop RESTful APIs to expose the model's inference capabilities to external clients and internal services.
subtasks.details: Design API endpoints, implement request/response validation, handle authentication, and ensure secure access to the model hosting endpoint.

subtasks.title: Backend Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate the REST API with backend systems to enable seamless data flow and orchestration.
subtasks.details: Connect the API to databases, authentication services, and business logic layers as required by the application architecture.

subtasks.title: Data Pipeline Setup
subtasks.description: Establish data pipelines for preprocessing, feature extraction, and feeding data into the model for inference.
subtasks.details: Implement ETL processes, automate data ingestion, and ensure data quality and consistency throughout the pipeline.

subtasks.title: Recommendation Logic Implementation
subtasks.description: Develop and integrate the logic for generating recommendations based on model outputs and business rules.
subtasks.details: Translate model predictions into actionable recommendations, apply post-processing, and handle edge cases as per requirements.

subtasks.title: Human-in-the-Loop Workflow Integration
subtasks.description: Incorporate mechanisms for human validation, feedback, and intervention in the recommendation process.

subtasks.title: Integration Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive integration testing to ensure all components work together as intended and meet quality standards.
subtasks.details: Develop test cases covering end-to-end scenarios, validate data flow, API responses, recommendation accuracy, and human-in-the-loop interactions.

subtasks.title: End-to-End Testing of Rule Management System

subtasks.title: Schema Extension for Multi-Tenancy
subtasks.description: Design and implement schema changes to support multi-tenancy, selecting an appropriate pattern (e.g., separate schemas per tenant, shared schema with tenant discriminator, or separate databases) based on isolation and customization requirements.
